bug.title: Split memos disappear
bug.description:
#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour 1. Click on transaction 1. Click on edit FAB button 1. Click on split icon 1. Add memo to 1 or more splits 1. Click "save" 1. Click "save" again 1. Click on edit FAB button 1. Click on split icon
#### Expected behaviour Splits have their memos.
#### Actual behaviour Split do not have their memos anymore.
#### Software specifications * GnuCash Android version: 2.2.0 * System Android version: 6.0 * Device type: Any
